name: 🇭​​🇦​​🇸​​🇭​​🇮​​🇷​​🇦-Md WHATSAPP BOT BY Astropeda
description: A Whatsapp Bot With Most Premium Features Makes Your Whatsapp Premium.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Your Heroku Api Key Here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here. Same as Above

LEVEL_UP_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot send Level up message in chat.

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Fill the value true if you  want bot view Status. and send them in your inbox

MSGS_IN_LOG.description: Fill the value true if you want to see Messages in the Console.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value false if you not want bot to read all messages.

DISABLE_PM.description: Disable dm and bot won't work in dm if True

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: If you want the bot to be Always Online use 'True'

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot. [!,.#] and more

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Dont put '+' only country code then number ",")

SESSION_ID.description:
Please put your SESSION_ID here,if you don't have visit to get Session id
https://replit.com/@astromedia0010/GNIME-MD-QR?v=1

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Please put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

WELCOME_MESSAGE.description: Enter the message here which you want to see when a new user joins a Group.

MONGODB_URI.description: Add Your Own, If you have key. Its a secret String for Mongodb Connection

WORKTYPE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.

AUTO_REACTION.description:
Set it `true` If You Wants To Reacts emoji to all commands. 
 And Set it `all` is You Wants to React Emojies to All Messages

TIME_ZONE.description: Add Your TimeZone. make sure the timzone is correct/Otherwise you will have errors

GNAME.description: Add Your Group Name Here.You Can See in Most Commands

WAURL.description: Add Your Group Link.You Can See IT IN Most Commands

REMOVE_BG_KEY.description: Add The RemoveBg Api Key.Git New APi Key From remove.bg
